con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-DATQIT-GUIStates
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests each state from processing of DAT and QIT files based on us: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2773
Test-Case: - Create dat and qit files and load to mft directories. - Exec step by step jobs for processing dat and qit files. - Validate states and results in responses from gui.
